summary: The Nobel Prize in Physics is a Nobel Prize in the science of Physics.
full_text: Alexander Mikhaylovich Prokhorov, or Aleksandr Mikhailovich Prokhorov,  was a Soviet physicist known for his pioneering research on lasers and masers for which he shared the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1964 with Charles Hard Townes and Nikolay Basov.
title: Aleksandr M. Prokhorov
